item.title: Chaotic-AUR
item.description: What is Chaotic-AUR? üëÄ # As Chaotic-AUR is the repository (kind of an appstore for Linux distributions) of Garuda Linux and one of the user repositories with the most (and most useful) packages out there I decided to provide another mirror for it.

item.title: About me
item.description: Who am I? # I’m a Linux and technology enthusiast from Germany who likes maintaining servers and learning more and more about how these things actually work inside.
